quotes.speaker: Ben Carter
quotes.quote: I’ve been saying the same thing for months, but nothing changes. How is that acceptable?

quotes.speaker: Emma Veritas
quotes.quote: It isn’t acceptable, Ben, and I’ve told them that too.

quotes.speaker: Ben Carter
quotes.quote: Then why is it still happening?

quotes.speaker: Emma Veritas
quotes.quote: Because the system is slow to respond, but I will continue to press them.

quotes.speaker: Ben Carter
quotes.quote: Slow isn’t good enough when my safety is on the line.

quotes.speaker: Emma Veritas
quotes.quote: I agree, it isn’t good enough.

contradictions.issue: Victim asks why systemic failure persists; advocate blames 'slow system' but concedes not acceptable
